meanings.definition: 見渡す、見晴らす、監督する、管理する
meanings.english_definition: to oversee, to survey, to supervise, to have a view of

examples.translation: He oversees the entire project. (彼はプロジェクト全体を監督している。)

examples.sentence: Vanaf de toren kun je de hele stad overzien.
examples.translation: From the tower, you can oversee the entire city. (塔からは街全体を見渡せる。)

collocations: een project overzien (to oversee a project)
een stad overzien (to have a view of a city)

etymology.value: From Middle Dutch *overziene, from Old Dutch *oversehan. Equivalent to over- + zien.

usage_notes.explanation: 'Overzien' can have two main meanings: 1) to have a view of something, to be able to see it from a high position; 2) to supervise or manage something, like a project or a team.
